entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
